definitions.definition: Agitation , publicity , public communication aimed at influencing an audience and furthering an agenda .
examples: Despite being biased and often untrue, propaganda material can be useful in OSINT analysis.

subdefinitions.definition: The propagation of the faith by the Catholic Church by means of missionary work etc.

definitions.definition: Such communication specifically when it is biased , misleading , and/or provoking mainly emotional responses.

main_definition: ( as a neutral word dated ) Agitation , publicity , public communication aimed at influencing an audience and furthering an agenda .
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory ) Such communication specifically when it is biased , misleading , and/or provoking mainly emotional responses.
